original_text: So think about what Christ said there. First he said to God, ‘You have not wanted gifts and sacrifices of animals. Any kind of sacrifice like that does not make you happy.’ But we know that Moses' rules taught about those sacrifices. God's law said that they were necessary. So think about what Christ said there. korean_text: 위에 말씀하시기를 주께서는 제사와 예물과 번제와 속죄제는 원하지도 아니하고 기뻐하지도 아니하신다 하셨고 (이는 다 율법을 따라 드리는 것이라)

sentences.original_text: So think about what Christ said there.
sentences.korean_translation: 그러니 그리스도가 거기서 말한 것을 생각해 보세요.

sentences.original_text: 'You have not wanted gifts and sacrifices of animals.
Any kind of sacrifice like that does not make you happy.'
sentences.korean_translation: 그런 종류의 제물은 당신을 기쁘게 하지 않습니다.'

sentences.original_text: But we know that Moses' rules taught about those sacrifices.
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 우리는 모세의 규칙이 그 제물들에 대해 가르쳤다는 것을 압니다.

sentences.original_text: God's law said that they were necessary.
